info.name: Nocturnal TweetDeck
info.description: A TweetDeck colorscheme based on the Nocturnal theme from Mokocchi. Use with Nocturnal for Windows 10 and Moko Firefox Theme. Also install Open Sans or change it. The theme is quite easy to edit, so feel free to make changes.
info.additionalInfo:
Jul 9 - Custom sprite sheet, minor image uploading, tweet scheduling and other misc theming
Jun 24 - Initial release
